name: Special Care
description: Good mental health care encompasses a wide range of services beyond simply receiving treatment for a mental health condition.

name: Children Mental Care
description: These doctors can diagnose mental illnesses, conduct therapy sessions, and prescribe and monitor medications.

name: Young Mental Care
description: Psychologists are mental health professionals that hold a Ph.D. in psychology. They may use the title doctor but are not medical doctors and cannot prescribe medications.

name: Older Mental Care
description: These mental health professionals typically have masterâ€™s degrees in psychology and provide therapy.

name: COVID-19 Vaccination

name: Meditation Center
description: Residential facilities dedicated to mental health care provide intensive treatment in a safe setting for weeks or months at a time.
